price: Hakika wasio amini Akhera bila ya shaka wao ndio wanawaita Malaika kwa majina ya kike.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ تَسۡمِيَةَ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
footnotes: Hakika hao wasio iamini Akhera ndio bila ya shaka wanao sema kuwa Malaika ni wanawake. Wanasema: Malaika ni mabinti wa Mwenyezi Mungu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati layusammūna al-malāikata tasmiyata al-unthā
